physicalDescription.skinColor: Iridescent teal with shimmering gold undertones
physicalDescription.eyeColor: Obsidian black with faint luminescent rings
physicalDescription.build: Lanky with elongated limbs and segmented exoskeletal plates
distinctFeatures: Four slender antennae that pulse with bioluminescent light
Six-fingered hands with semi-translucent, flexible digits
A crest-like protrusion running from the crown of their head to mid-back
physicalDescription.voice: Resonant and layered, as though multiple tones speak in unison

biology.homePlanet: Vyralys Prime, a planet covered in crystalline forests and vast oceans of liquid nitrogen
uniqueAbilities: Electrostatic manipulation, allowing them to generate and control electrical currents
Hyper-adaptive vision capable of seeing across multiple spectrums
A secondary brain cluster used for advanced multitasking and pattern recognition
weaknesses: Susceptible to extreme dehydration, requiring constant exposure to humid environments
Sensitive to certain sound frequencies that can disorient or incapacitate them

technology.signatureDevice: A symbiotic wrist-mounted device called the 'Synflux Core,' which amplifies their electrostatic abilities and acts as a translator for over 10,000 languages
tools: Crystalline data shards for storing and accessing vast amounts of information
An energy shield generator embedded in their exoskeleton for personal defense
Micro-drone swarms used for reconnaissance and minor repairs
technology.transport: A personal starcraft named 'Eclipse Harbinger,' powered by a fusion of dark matter and solar energy

notableEvents.description: Witnessed the catastrophic fragmentation of their home planet due to a rogue black hole's gravitational pull, forcing their species into diaspora.
Brokered peace between three warring galactic factions through a daring diplomatic maneuver involving their electrostatic manipulation abilities.
Survived an assassination attempt by a former ally, leaving them with a deep scar along their left side and a lingering mistrust of others.

goals: To locate and reunite the scattered remnants of the Quervalian people
To restore the lost archives of Vyralys Prime, which contained the collective knowledge of their species
To uncover the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of their mentor, Eldara Veyl
challenges: Struggling with the loneliness of being one of the last Quervalians in the galaxy
Evading bounty hunters hired by those who see their abilities as a threat
Navigating a galaxy increasingly hostile to refugees and outsiders
